31881.affected_area: BC Interior, Lower Mainland & Vancouver Island
live_updates: We continue to await restoration of hydro power to be restored in the affected areas. Once hydro is restored our services will begin to come online. Thank you for your patience.
We're looking into it. Stay tuned for updates.
31881.summary: . We are working to restore service as quickly as possible and apologize for any inconvenience this may cause.
